## Render all files

The following code renders all quarto documents into html and put them into the results folder.

```{r}
filenames <- list.files('.')[-c(1, length(list.files('.')))]
results_path <- '../results/'
output_format <- 'html'
for (filename in filenames) {
  quarto::quarto_render(input = filename)
  file.rename(from = paste(filename[1:(nchar(filename) - 3),
                                    output_format]),
            to = paste(results_path,
                       paste(filename[1:(nchar(filename) - 3),
                                    output_format])))
}
```
